display_long_description:
🌟 Adorably Addictive Fitness

Your daily adventure in fitness starts now.

Tired of boring workouts?

It’s time to turn them into a fun and exciting journey!

 ⠀


🎯 Work Out Like a Game

Run, complete missions, and collect Health Stones!

Before you know it, you’ll be sweating and smiling.⠀


🐾 Grow Together with T-ON Friends

Exercising alone can feel exhausting, right?

With your cute and reliable T-ON Friends,

every workout feels like leveling up!

 ⠀


🌅 Mindful Moments, Emotional Touch

Stretch and meditate by a campfire,

by the calm sea, or deep in a firefly-filled forest.

Breathe in peace, breathe out stress.

 ⠀


📱 The App Makes It All Complete

From home workout content to schedule tracking and fitness results,

continue your fitness journey with the T-ON app.


 ⠀



📌 Key Features

Help out your troubled Friends

Compete in fitness challenges with Friends


Collect hidden Health Stones in each region

Personalized workouts guided by KIKI

Relax and recover with meditation and stretching sessions after exercise

 ⠀


 📱Join us on T-ON APP now! 

[Keyword : t-on care / t-oncare]


(Google) https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kr.hmit.tioncare 


(iOS) https://apps.apple.com/us/app/t-on/id6443477483

[media]

 ⠀

👇 Join us on Discord now!

https://discord.com/invite/as8yVmjJcC
